DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine objective tumor response rate , duration response , time disease progression patient metastatic colorectal cancer treat DHA-paclitaxel . II . Determine overall survival patient treated drug . III . Determine toxicity profile drug patient . IV . Assess quality life patient treated drug . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive DHA-paclitaxel IV 2 hour day 1 . Treatment repeat every 21 day absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Quality life assess baseline , every 2 course , end study treatment . Patients follow every 3 month . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 18-50 patient accrue study .
